flavorText:
"Why infiltrate their strongholds when what we seek resides in such a poorly guarded safe?"
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

foreignData.flavorText: „Warum sollten wir in ihre Festungen eindringen, wenn das, was wir suchen, in so schlecht bewachten Behältern wartet?" —Malcator, Vollstrecker der Synthese
foreignData.name: Verstandesauslese
foreignData.text: Du ziehst zwei Karten, und ein Gegner deiner Wahl wirft zwei Karten aus der Hand ab.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Por qué infiltrarnos en sus fortalezas cuando lo que buscamos está en un lugar tan mal custodiado?" —Malcator, ejecutor de síntesis
foreignData.name: Martirio mental
foreignData.text: Roba dos cartas y el oponente objetivo descarta dos cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Pourquoi infiltrer leurs forteresses quand ce que nous cherchons est aussi piètrement gardé ? » —Malcator, Exécuteur de Synthèse
foreignData.name: Massacre de l'esprit
foreignData.text: Vous piochez deux cartes et l'adversaire ciblé se défausse de deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: "Perché infiltrarsi nelle loro fortezze se quello che cerchiamo risiede in uno scrigno così sguarnito?" —Malcator, Esecutore della Sintesi
foreignData.name: Vagliamente
foreignData.text: Peschi due carte e un avversario bersaglio scarta due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我々が求める物がかくも守りの薄い金庫に納められているというのに、何故城砦に潜り込まねばならぬのだ？」 ――統合の実行者、マルカトール
foreignData.name: 精神間引き
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。あなたはカードを２枚引き、そのプレイヤーはカードを２枚捨てる。

foreignData.flavorText: "Por que se infiltrar em suas fortalezas quando o que procuramos encontra-se num cofre tão mal guardado?" — Malcator, Executor de Síntese
foreignData.name: Seleção Mental
foreignData.text: Você compra dois cards e o oponente alvo descarta dois cards.

foreignData.flavorText: «Зачем проникать в их крепости, когда то, что мы ищем, содержится в столь плохо охраняемом сейфе?» — Малкатор, Исполнитель Синтеза
foreignData.name: Селекция Умов
foreignData.text: Вы берете две карты, а целевой оппонент сбрасывает две карты.

foreignData.flavorText: 「既然我们要找的东西摆在防卫如此松懈的保险箱里，又何必要渗透他们的要塞？」 ～合成执行人麻卡特
foreignData.name: 心灵挑拣
foreignData.text: 你抓两张牌且目标对手弃两张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 「既然我們要找的東西擺在防衛如此鬆懈的保險箱裡，又何必要滲透他們的要塞？」 ～合成執行人麻卡特
foreignData.name: 心靈挑揀
foreignData.text: 你抽兩張牌且目標對手棄兩張牌。

name: Mindculling
originalText: You draw two cards and target opponent discards two cards.

rulings.text: You must be able to target an opponent to cast Mindculling. If that opponent is an illegal target when Mindculling tries to resolve, it’ll be countered and will have no effect. You won’t draw two cards.
If the opponent has one card in hand, that player will discard that card and you will draw two cards. If the opponent has no cards in hand, you will draw two cards.

text: You draw two cards and target opponent discards two cards.
